description:
- King Camera is simply the best All-In-One Photo App on the App Store.
AND with direct INSTAGRAM sharing!


Hard to Believe?
See for yourself. It's FREE!

.

.

.

.



But DON'T JUST TAKE OUR WORD for it:
------------------------------------

-  "The best photo application in the App Store." -lovefortech.com

-  "There’s nothing on the App Store that can quite match what King Camera has to offer!" -theNextWeb.com

- "Really does live up to its claims." -iSource.com

- "Impressive & limitless creativity!" - Mashable.com

- "The Most Complete Camera App that Delivers on its Promises!" -icommephoto.com

- “Favorite camera app alongside Camera+ and Camera Genius” -148apps.com





----------------
Shoot + Enhance + Share = happyness! :)

DEMO VIDEOS + FULL FEATURE LISTING: 
www.saycheezzz.com

- IN-APP PURCHASE:
King Camera FREE is fully functional in Web Resolution. You can do everything King Camera has to offer: Take photos, Edit them, Export them, Share them, etc.!  New customers can unleash KC's full potential with the in-app purchase:
HR PACK : 
- ability to export in med & full res
- remove KC watermark
- remove banner ads

Download King Camera now! Thank us later!
----------------



----------------
KING CAMERA FULL SPECS:

CAMERA: flashlight – self timer – anti-shake – sound trigger – full resolution burst mode – big button – time lapse – stop motion animation – WB lock – exposure lock – grid lines – add photographer name to metadata – HD video

EDITING:  - 36 quality photo Looks – create custom Looks - copy/paste Looks – non destructive editing – infinite edits of original – advanced editing module with: white balance, exposure, contrast, shadows and highlights, crop, flip, rotate, saturation, tints, Intensifier, Colorizer, light leaks, textures, vignettes, custom borders and frames 

SHARE: - one tap sharing – multiple Facebook accounts, FB Pages and Twitter accounts – email – MMS – FlickR - Dropbox
----------------
releaseNotes:
KC v2.6;
- now FULLY UNLOCKED in ADWARE MODE:
 (enter AD CODE will unlock the full app for 24hrs each time.)
no more banner ads, no more watermarks, no more low resolution export and sharing.

- In-App Purchase will remome the ADWARE system
Note: ADWARE doesn't appear for current users who have purchased the app or in-app HR Pack. 

- 3 new Frames
- 3 new Light Leaks
- 3 new Textures

- minor fixes
